rationale:

Functional
Feasible
Needs Further Specification

rationale:
"Show which nucleo is under control;"

Group: Monitoring
Functional
Feasible
Detailing level: Satisfactory
comments:
The system has two nucleos according to the diagram in the slides, so I made this relatively detailed.

This requirement might benefit from a "GUI" or similar component.

One could also capture this behaviour with a separate 'Condition then Response' requirement for each Nucleo; this might read better but creates more requirements. Alternatively, one might want to refactor this requirement

rationale:
"Run each simulation loop within 10ms"

Group: Simulation
Functional
Feasible
Detailing Level: Satisfactory
fulltext: when SimulationLoopStart System shall within 10 milliseconds satisfy SimulationLoopFinish

semantics.description: ENFORCED: in the interval defined by the entire execution. TRIGGER: first point in the interval if (SimulationLoopStart) is true and any point in the interval where (SimulationLoopStart) becomes true (from false). REQUIRES: for every trigger, RES must hold at some point with distance <= 10 from the trigger (i.e., at trigger, trigger+1, ..., or trigger+10). If the interval ends sooner than trigger+10, then RES need not hold.
